title: ఈ ఫోటో ‘పంచతత్త్వ విగ్రహాల ప్రతిష్ట’ వేడుకకి సంబంధించి 2019 లో రష్యా లో తీసినది
subtitle: The robot in the post has nothing to do with the king of Bahrain. It is the world’s first entertainment robot developed by a British company called Cyberstein.
author: factly.in
vclaim: FACTLY is one of the well known Data Journalism/Public Information portals in India.
